## Summary Information 

The coronavirus has been reported all over the world, with `r summar_info_lst$country_region_affected` countries/regions and `r summar_info_lst$province_state_affected` provinces/states reporting cases. The country/region that was most impacted was `r summar_info_lst$most_affected_country_region`. A total number of `r summar_info_lst$total_confirmed` cases have been reported, and of those `r summar_info_lst$total_recovery` have gone on to recover while `r summar_info_lst$total_death` have died.
